attributes.action: change voting on government online petitions to allow voting against.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change this Petitions website to allow people to register a contrary vote if they disagree with the petition in question. Show how many for and against on petition web page. This should give a more balanced view of feeling about petitions in question.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
